New Records: David Fry hit the second pinch-homer in Cleveland postseason history
David Fry hit the fourth go-ahead pinch home run in postseason history when trailing in seventh inning or later
Key Match Events: David Fry had a go-ahead, two-run homer in the seventh inning
David Fry bunted home an insurance run in the ninth
Emmanuel Clase preserved a 4-3 lead in the eighth when he escaped a second-and-third jam by striking out Trey Sweeney on a 100.9 mph cutter
Pre-Game Insights: Tarik Skubal will start Game 5 for the Tigers on Saturday night in Cleveland
Matthew Boyd may start Game 5 for the Guardians, whose last Game 5 was a loss to the Yankees in the 2022 ALCS
Post-Match Reflections: Cleveland ended a streak of 11 losses in postseason elimination games dating to Game 6 of 1997 World Series
The winner advances to the AL Championship Series against the Yankees in New York starting Monday
Miscellaneous Highlights: 44,923 fans set a playoff attendance record for the second straight day at 25-year-old Comerica Park
Lane Thomas ended the Guardiansâ€™ 20-inning scoreless streak with a two-out RBI single in the first off Reese Olson
